actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code (as it pertains to accumulated taxable corporate income) to provide for an increase in the accumulated earnings credit.

summary.text: Increases the accumulated earnings credit for accumulated taxable corporate income from $100,000 to $500,000 under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code (as it pertains to accumulated taxable corporate income) to provide for an increase in the accumulated earnings credit.
